Q_DESC:
Laran is awesome. His friends call him little Einstien. To test him, his friends gave him a string. They told him to add the string with its reverse string and follow these rules:

Every ith character of string will be added to every ith character of reverse string.
Both string will contain only lower case alphabets(a-z).
Eg:- a+a=b,a+c=d,z+a=a (Refer to sample test cases for more details)
Input:

First line contains a value N denoting number of test cases. Next N lines contains string str.

Output:

For every string str output the string that Jacks friends wants from him.

Constraints

1 <= N <= 10

1 <= str <= 10^5
TESTCASE_1:
4
hello
codeapocalypse
programming
world
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
wqxqw
hhtdmqrrqmdthh
wfxtebetxfw
